title: So Someone just stole my role in ranked
body: I have screenshots. What do fam?

replies.body:
http://i.snag.gy/BbgYt.jpg

But really, if you played the match, report them for negative behavior and link the screenshot in the description. If you didn't play the match to avoid them, submit it in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
there's nothing u can do but cooperate harassing him for it is the same as being toxic just take a role that hasnt been picked and go with it isnt it that simple?

Nope.

That sounds like a terrible idea really.
U report him. He WILL get banned for doing it.

I want to report also something very serius....Someone stole my cookies from kitchen table 
there is 3 possible thiefs but i want your help to find who is the real one!
1. My mother .. cause when i ask her who eat my cookies she smiles me with wierd way!
2. my sister ... cause i smell her hands and this is the smell of my cookies but she denied she stole the cookies
3.My grand dad ... when i ask him who stole my cookies he smile with evil way and he left a big big  fart goes loud and the smell was from my cookies!

Please i beg you all who is the real thief of my role? arrr i mean of my cookies:)
Answer only with facts thnx all ...
I can see why you are unranked. With a 35% winrate
then you'll most likely fuck up and get banned like i did a few days ago
